thread.title: Star Jones campaigns for Clinton in South Carolina
thread.title_full: Star Jones campaigns for Clinton in South Carolina - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Star Jones campaigns for Clinton in South Carolina
text: GREENVILLE, S.C. (AP) Â— Attorney and TV personality Star Jones is in South Carolina this week to campaign for Hillary Clinton. Jones and U.S. Rep. Chandra Dillard are taking part in a community forum Saturday in Greenville. Organizers say the event at Pilgrim Rest Baptist Church is focusing particularly on issues important to women and families. Participants are also planning to talk about gun violence, equal pay and affordable health and child care. Subscribe to The Tampa Tribune
